revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=SURFboard |revision=SB6121 |upc=612572186237 |ean= |asin=B004XC6GJ0 |price= |est_release_date=07/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETC4830;P5M, TNETC4830ZDWG, 08A2G8W, EI; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6445EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9725G6JB-3 |ram1_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1119R;88E1119R-NNW2, O2C2871.5, 1024 A0P, TW; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Cable Tuner;Microtune;MT2170;;1; ,,, Programmable Gain Amplifier;Microtune;MT1570;;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |oui= }} {{TagLine|Motorola SB6121 SURFboard DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000GNcscAAD}}
"586121 MAIN BOARD", "569204-001 REV: 4", and "APR-27-2010" is silkscreened on the board in the image linked below.
===Image + details=== <!-- [http://imageshack.us/f/94/front01g.jpg/ Here on '''imageshack'''] -->[http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=8351 Board shot on '''usbjtag.com'''] :A date code of '''1029''', "MADE IN CHINA", "SBG6121 MAIN BOARD", "569204-001 REV: 4", and "APR-27-2010" is silkscreened on the board shown. ::"P/N: 569206-001-00" is (among other things) printed on the label affixed to the tuner shield.
===Specification=== :SoC: TNETC4830ZDWG (used by the 8x4-specced SB6141) :RAM: [http://www.winbond.com/hq/enu/ProductAndSales/ProductLines/SpecialtyDRAM/DDR2SDRAM/W9725G6JB.htm W9725G6JB-3] 256Mb DDR2 :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L6445EMI-10G 8 MB :Switch: GbE PHY appears to be a ''Marvell'' 88E1119R-NNW2
*TNETC4830 = Puma5 (note the "PM5" next to TI logo) :PM5 details are available [http://www.ihs.com/news/ti-docsis-chipset.htm here]
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=292 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} ([http://www.timewarnercable.com/en/residential-home/support/faqs/faqs-equipment-and-instruction-manuals/modems/motorola/motorola-sb6121.html '''Time Warner''' device information & manuals])
===Additional external links=== *[http://cable-wizardz.co.uk/topic/4883-docsis-30-hack-forceware-v11-r12-firmware-download/ ''Docsis 3.0 Hack - Forceware V.1.1 R12 Firmware + Download'' on '''Cable-Wizardz.co.uk'''] :The SB6121 is noted as using a MT2170 tuner + a MT1570 amplifier.
DOCSIS 3.0 4x4 {{CableModemSpec |down_c=4 |up_c=4 }}
__NOTOC__
